name: Bosque 2011 (Fantasmas en la Lluvia P.1)
description:
Bosque 2011 is the first ambient work in "Fantasmas de la LLuvia", a 4-part ambient sound series that focuses on perspective-changing encounters in the rain. 
Each song evokes a moment in time, bathed in the constant murmur of rain, and hints at the spirits, ghosts, and creatures that dwell in the curtains that fall from the sky.
Each song has an accompanying visual work that provides an impression of the scene. The complete series will eventually be released to streaming platforms with static cover art when complete.
